name: Circle Pops
description:
* Plan your taps-- Grow shapes without letting them collide!
* Shapes move-- Prepare for a delightful blend of timing and strategy!
* Dozens of levels-- Packed with challenge/variety/pizzazz!
* Chaos/order/symmetry/asymmetry-- This puppy's got it all!
* Zero triangles-- Seriously, no triangles. None. We promise! (Maybe!)
